actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill relating to the effect which Federal enrollment and licensing of vessels employed in the fisheries has with respect to certain State restrictions on engaging in commercial fishing within State boundaries.

summary.text: Stipulates that the authority to engage in fishing by Federal licensing shall be limited by restrictions, including residency requirements, which may be imposed by a State with respect to its maritime boundaries.

titles.title: A bill relating to the effect which Federal enrollment and licensing of vessels employed in the fisheries has with respect to certain State restrictions on engaging in commercial fishing within State boundaries.
